output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240015 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions two presidential candidates: - Marcel Ciolacu (negatively) - Elena Lasconi (positively, with direct call to vote)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram with significant reach (60,000-70,000 impressions).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral objective with: - Direct call to vote ("Veniți la vot. #ElenaLasconiPreședinte") - Negative campaigning against Ciolacu - Promoting USR's candidate
5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content but rather campaign material with clear political messaging.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication with CMF number and paid distribution.
The post represents clear electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7) and explicitly calls for voting for a specific presidential candidate.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Lasconi) - Contains explicit call to vote - Negative campaigning against another presidential candidate - Paid distribution with wide reach - Official party communication
conclusion.message-for-police: Uniunea Salvați România (USR), pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea si promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 463364796334558) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, continand propaganda electorala explicita pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea contine un indemn direct la vot pentru candidatul Elena Lasconi ("#ElenaLasconiPreședinte"), precum si atacuri la adresa contracandidatului Marcel Ciolacu, fiind marcata cu numar CMF 11240015. Postarea a fost distribuita ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, atingand intre 60.000 si 70.000 de afisari, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta votul in cadrul alegerilor prezidentiale prin continuarea propagandei electorale dupa incheierea perioadei legale.
